# Ignore VirtualBox / VM files
*.ova
*.ovf
*.vmdk
*.vdi
*.vbox
*.vbox-prev
*.vbox-prev-*
*.log
*.sav
*.vbox-*

# Ignore ISO images
*.iso

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
desktop.ini

# Editor / IDE files
*.swp
*.swo
*.idea/
.vscode/
*.code-workspace

# Python cache (if you add scripts later)
__pycache__/
*.pyc
*.pyo
*.pyd

# Node / npm (if you add JS tools later)
node_modules/
